pages.title: Ethereal Platform
pages.text: In your search for a block that is passable for you but doesn't destroy the look of your buildings, $(l:resources/stargazing)Shooting Stars$() were a great help.\\With the intensifying power of $(l:general/onyx_shards)Onyx$(), you were able to strengthen the particles to such an extent that they became solid.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Another practical feature of Ethereal Platforms is that the platform reacts only to living creatures. Objects, such as items, simply pass through it.
